verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: On Wednesday morning] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: descended] [ARG1: into an angry rampage against the media] , [ARGM-ADV: threatening to remove news networks ' press credentials over " negative " coverage] .

On Wednesday morning , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] descended into an angry rampage against the media , [V: threatening] [ARG1: to remove news networks ' press credentials over " negative " coverage] .

On Wednesday morning , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] descended into an angry rampage against the media , threatening to [V: remove] [ARG1: news networks ' press credentials] [ARGM-CAU: over " negative " coverage] .
